comments: # JavaScript function to generate a random email address
steps.name: def generateRandomClientEmail =
set APIClientData.clientEmail = generateRandomClientEmail()
comments: # We set the generated prefix of our json file of clientEmail to the returned value of the js function

elements.name: verify the successful creation of an order with an available book (book in stock)

steps.name: def generatedAccessToken = tokenCreationFeature.response.accessToken
comments: # Call the scenario that generates the access token and store the response in a variable

steps.name: header Authorization = 'Bearer ' + generatedAccessToken
comments: # Extract the access token from the response and store it in a variable
